name: Grown-Up Granita
description: This concoction feels granita-like to me, granita being — as you may know — a sort of slushy Italian dessert usually made from water, sugar and fruit or other flavorings. Obviously, this isn’t that. In fact, I cheat completely, beginning with a pint of good-quality sorbet and then simply adding the other ingredients, two of which contain alcohol.
keywords: dessert, dry prosecco, lemon sorbet, gluten-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 6 to 8 fresh mint leaves for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Put the sorbet and gin in a food processor or blender and blend until well combined but still slushy. Pour into champagne flutes, top with Prosecco, garnish with mint leaves and serve immediately.
